title: Fix admin login authentication functionality

requirements.text: Debug and fix the admin login authentication flow to ensure successful login with email admin@gmail.com and password Admin@92505
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can successfully log in using email admin@gmail.com and password Admin@92505
Authentication state persists in localStorage after successful login
User is redirected to /admin dashboard after successful login
Invalid credentials display the error message 'Invalid email or password'
Login button shows loading state during authentication

requirements.text: Verify that the useAuth hook login function correctly validates credentials against hardcoded admin credentials and updates authentication state
acceptanceCriteria: Login function returns true for correct credentials (admin@gmail.com / Admin@92505)
Login function returns false for incorrect credentials
Authentication state (isAuthenticated, user) is updated correctly on successful login
localStorage persistence works correctly for auth state

requirements.text: Ensure AdminAuthGuard component correctly reads authentication state from useAuth hook and allows access to /admin route when authenticated
acceptanceCriteria: Authenticated users can access /admin dashboard without redirect
Unauthenticated users are redirected to /admin/login with redirect parameter
Authentication check completes without infinite loops or flickering
Loading spinner displays during authentication verification

requirements.text: Fix any console errors or JavaScript exceptions occurring during the login process on the AdminLogin page
acceptanceCriteria: No console errors when submitting login form
Form submission handler executes without exceptions
Error states display correctly when authentication fails
Success state triggers navigation to admin dashboard

constraints: Use hardcoded credentials: email admin@gmail.com and password Admin@92505
Do not modify the Internet Identity hook files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx)
Keep existing admin login page design matching the mockup with teal theme and shield icon
nonGoals: Implementing backend authentication with token validation
Adding password reset or forgot password functionality
Creating user registration or multi-user admin system
Replacing email/password authentication with Internet Identity
